original_text:
And I will put an end to all her mirth,
    her feasts, her new moons, her Sabbaths,
    and all her appointed feasts.
korean_text: 내가 그의 모든 희락과 절기와 월삭과 안식일과 모든 명절을 폐하겠고

sentences.original_text: And I will put an end to all her mirth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그녀의 모든 즐거움을 끝내겠으며,

sentences.original_text: I will put an end to her feasts,
I will put an end to her new moons,
I will put an end to her Sabbaths,
and I will put an end to all her appointed feasts.
